name: Smole space astronaut floats by casually
name_original: Smole space astronaut floats by casually
description:
Smole space astronaut floats by casually Made for GMTK Game Jam 2020 All code and assets were developed within the 48 hours. Summary:

During a mission in a dangerous part of space, an astronaut's spaceship failed critically! The poor spaceman is now out of control, floating back towards earth. However, with the many dangers lurking in the cosmos, he will not be able to make it back alive on his own. As a space sentry, you must shoot down the numerous threats to the cosmonaut's life until he arrives safely.

Featuring:
  • An astronaut that is out of control
  •  Aliens that shoot bullets that you have to dodge
  •  Asteroids, too
  •  Cool royalty-free space music
  • We have a unique mechanic where you can shoot at the astronaut to move him
Controls:
  • Left Mouse Button (LMB) To shoot
  • Blast your astronaut to move him around!
  • You can blast asteroids and aliens, but not the huge asteroids!
  • R to Restart

(Temporarily, you have to Alt+F4 to close the game as the Esc function isn't working!)


Made by:

Mr. Kim (Programming, Game design, Art)

Histy  (Programming, Game design, Art)

Pizzacus (Game design, Art)

Credits to :
